title: BRIEF-Raytheon And Korean Air Partner On Multiple-Intelligence Aircraft For Republic Of Korea Air Force
text:
BRIEF-Raytheon And Korean Air Partner On Multiple-Intelligence Aircraft For Republic Of Korea Air Force

Economy 1 hour ago (Oct 15, 2019 02:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Raytheon And Korean Air Partner On Multiple-Intelligence Aircraft For Republic Of Korea Air Force Oct 15 (Reuters) - Raytheon (NYSE: ) Co RTN.N : * RAYTHEON AND KOREAN AIR PARTNER ON MULTIPLE-INTELLIGENCE AIRCRAFT FOR REPUBLIC OF KOREA AIR FORCE * UNDER AGREEMENT, RAYTHEON WILL BE PRIME CONTRACTOR AND PROVIDE MULTIPLE-INTELLIGENCE, OR MULTI-INTEREST, TECHNOLOGIES FOR AIRCRAFT * UNDER AGREEMENT KOREAN AIR WILL DELIVER DESIGN, LOGISTICS AND LIFE CYCLE SUPPORT SERVICES * WORKING WITH BOMBARDIER, RAYTHEON AND KOREAN AIR WILL MODIFY GLOBAL 6500 BUSINESS JETS TO MEET ROKAF'S SPECIFIC MISSION NEEDS * CO, KOREAN AIR SIGNED AGREEMENT TO PURSUE REPUBLIC OF KOREA'S AIR FORCE'S INTELLIGENCE SURVEILLANCE TARGET ACQUISITION & RECONNAISSANCE PROGRAM

BRIEF-Raytheon And Korean Air Partner On Multiple-Intelligence Aircraft For Republic Of Korea Air Force
description: BRIEF-Raytheon And Korean Air Partner On Multiple-Intelligence Aircraft For Republic Of Korea Air Force
